div.p: A summary of what the element is used for
A narrative description of the use of the element. Mark up other elements and attributes mentioned from the same Tag Library.
Description that only applies to a shared element in EAC
Description that only applies to a shared element in EAD
A listing of usage of attributes with the element (optional)
Attribute usage that only applies to a shared element in EAC
Attribute usage that only applies to a shared element in EAD
A listing of other elements in the tag library that are relevant to, or similar to, the element (optional)
Other elements in the tag library that are relevant to a shared element in EAC only
Other elements in the tag library that are relevant to a shared element in EAD only

div.egXML: ]]
